name: Return of Reckoning
description:
files:
- lotro_installer: http://launcher.returnofreckoning.com/RoRLauncher.exe

  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017

task.description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- ror_installer: https://launcher.returnofreckoning.com/RoRInstaller.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Return of Reckoning/
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: --mode unattended
    executable: lotro_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
